data.prayer: Father, convict the 41,518 believers in Zeeuwse meren to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zeeuwse meren, Netherlands
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Zeeuwse meren, Netherlands that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Zeeuwse meren. Through your servants plant 206 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Zeeuwse meren. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Arab, Saudi - Najdi people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, we pray that the people of Zeeuwse meren, Netherlands will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Please, teach the 41,518 believers in Zeeuwse meren, Netherlands how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Zeeuwse meren, Netherlands know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

location.name: Zeeuwse meren
